TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F Austin to James Cummins, 06-13-1825

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin to James Cummins, June 13, 1825. Announcing settlement of the Buckner case.
barker_notes.barker_footnotes: See Buckner to Austin, August 10, 1825. Whether this fragment refers to Buckner is uncertain but likely
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1133-1134

*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to James Cummins, June 13, 1825. Announcing settlement of the Buckner case.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*The matter has been investigated which induced the summons of *person_mentioned*A. C. Buckner*/person_mentioned* before me, and the result of such investigation has satisfied me that the acts of said *person_mentioned*Buckner */person_mentioned*which were deemed exceptionable proceeded from misconception, and the said *person_mentioned*Buckner*/person_mentioned* having manifested a submission to the Laws and *person_mentioned*authorities of the Government*/person_mentioned*—Therefore in order that the public may be satisfied as to the result of this matter it is directed that the whole affair be dismissed, under the belief that his deportment will be such as to merit the approbation of the *person_mentioned*authorities of the Government*/person_mentioned* and the more effectually to avoid any excitement which a reference to the subject in private conversation might create it is recommended that it be totally forgotten and consigned to oblivion.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*San felipe de Austin*/person_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="06-13-1825">13 June 1825*/date_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p*To *person_mentioned*James Cummins Esqr*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*[On the reverse:]*/p*
*p*La hospitalidad y amistad qe. hacia los *person_mentioned*extrangeros */person_mentioned*caracteriza los *person_mentioned*Mexicanos*/person_mentioned*, con q. este sujeto fue tratado en lo *location_mentioned*interior*/location_mentioned*, ha producido tal efecto sobre su orgullo propio qe. piensan qe. tiene influxo pa. trastornar un *location_mentioned*Estado */location_mentioned*y ahora según me dice el va llevar sus quejas al *person_mentioned*Congreso del Estado*/person_mentioned*—estas consiste en esto—*/p*
*/div1*
